XI.iii.1.B.3.b
.
Payment Amount for NSC Burial Allowance
Unless VA has evidence on the date of receipt of the notice of the Veteran’s death, that the burial expenses incurred were less, VBA will pay the maximum NSC burial allowance per
38 U.S.C. 2303(a)
.
References
:  For more information on
the maximum NSC burial allowance, see
burial benefits rates
, and
38 U.S.C. 2303
, and
an example of SC claim received after the NSC burial allowance is paid, see
M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, 1.B.2.i
.
